application

Class Gridcontroller2

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Gridcontroller2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class Gridcontroller2
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

    This class acts as controller class for the 15X10 Grid.

    This is the class which handles all the operations of the game such as inserting an orb,undo,restart,splitting when fully loaded
    Author:
    hrithik

      • setgridlines

        public void setgridlines()
        This method is used to set the color of the gridlines of the gamegrid. The color of the lines is set to the color of the player whose turn it is.

      • addorb

        void addorb(int x,
            int y)
        Simply adds an orb to a cell by calling the addorbn function. n is the nth orb it is adding.

        x - Column address
        y - Row address
